S04n397:1: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ tasmāddevanikāyādavatīrya siṃhaladvīpaṃ pratyudgataḥ |
S04n397:2: gatvā ca rākṣasīnāṃ purato vyavasthitaḥ kāmarūpamātmānamabhinirmāya prāsādikam |
S04n397:3: atha tā rākṣasyo'nyonyamevamāhuḥ–ayamīdṛśaṃ paramakāmarūpī puruṣo dṛśyate |
S04n397:4: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ kāmacittamutpannam |
S04n397:5: tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramyaitadavocan–bhavāṃstvaṃ bhajasva asmākaṃ kumārīyauvanam,
S04n397:14: imāni te'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhāni vicitrāṇi śayanāni udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramayāṇi ||
S04n397:17: tāśca tamāhuḥ–kathaṃ vayaṃ tavājñāṃ na kariṣyāmaḥ ?
S04n397:21: atha tā rākṣasyastasyapuruṣasyāntikādāryāṣṭāṅgikamārgaṃ gṛhītvā daśa kuśalāni ca saṃsmarya,
S04n397:28: tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ rāgaduḥkhaṃ na bādhate |
S04n397:36: yādṛśena jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā jīvanti annena pānena,
S04n397:40: tādṛśaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaramupagṛhītvā tasyaiva puruṣasya purato'nimiṣairnayanaiḥ prekṣamāṇāḥ prasthitāḥ ||
